content: Samadhi Wind Agate is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Samadhi_Wind_Agate.md', within the main section titled 'Samadhi Wind Agate'.
The content is as follows:
Samadhi Wind Agate is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
